ygData.subject: Re: Twinking Causes a Crisis of Faith
ygData.msgSnippet: LOL, how do you know who our characters know? =) Please don t ASSume such things. Mine come from the same town, it s highly likely they know eachother and may
ygData.messageBody:
LOL, how do you know who our characters know? =) Please don't ASSume such
things. Mine come from the same town, it's highly likely they know eachother
and may even be related!

Currently the facts are there is not much to do for lvl 50's on a server
crowded with high levels so twinking is going to happen. Until Verant gets
off their asses and stops nerfing the freakin game, and does something about
it that's the way it's gonna be. There are many things we could do, but you
know what - on my server almost EVERY night those many things we could do
are already being done by someone else. 80 people in Lower Guk average, 60
people in Sol B, usually at least a group doing Kedge, and it's hard to get
the right people together for a planes raid so when those raids happen they
happen. Dragons pop once a week, FG's pop every 8 hours - BOTH life spans
are a couple hours at most (no lie). We complain to Verant, and what do they
do? They add a bunch of rediculously high level mobs to Kith, screwing all
the low level travellers. Now you tell me what else is there to do. Please
tell me now - thx info! Trust me, I have tried and tried lately to find
something xp-gaining for Sart to do with NO luck. Maybe if Paw doesn't suck
it may help a LITTLE, but it is not a very large place (comparatively).
We'll see how that turns out.

Ph34r my bad grammar! =P

just my 2,000,000 plat..

Sartori D'Elsiraad <The Companions>
Bard of Quellious of the 50th Chorus
Veeshan


>From: "RaceFace" <bean@...>
>Reply-To: eqbards@onelist.com
>To: <eqbards@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [eqbards] Twinking Causes a Crisis of Faith
>Date: Wed, 1 Dec 1999 20:06:32 -0600
>
>Because your chars don't know each other from a hole in the ground. :)
>
>I don't think twinking should be acceptable just because level 50 people
>are
>bored. They should give the level 50 people something to do then. :)
>
>If you adventure and get an item you can't use.. give it to someone else.
>Trade it for something of an appropriate level that you CAN use.
>
> > Yes this will not happen because Verant does not have a problem with
> > twinking. If you adventure and get a item you can't use why shouldn't
>you
>be
> > able to make a new char and use it? That's what Verant said's and I
>happen
> > to agree because what else is there for a level 50 to do?
> >
> > Naeeldar
